body:
### Problem

Inlay hints stop working when multiple LSP clients reply to `'textDocument/inlayhint'` after document changes.

The corresponding error from the nvim log file (in `~/.local/state/nvim`):
```
ERR ... decor_provider_error:36: Error in decoration provider "win" (ns=nvim.lsp.inlayhint):
Error executing lua: /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp/inlay_hint.lua:349: Invalid 'col': out of range
stack traceback:
	[C]: in function 'nvim_buf_set_extmark'
	/usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp/inlay_hint.lua:349: in function </usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp/inlay_hint.lua:303>
```

The bug also occurs with the current nightly AppImage (`NVIM v0.12.0-dev-1493+gfe4faaf81a`)

Don't spend time to debug this error for yourself first. This is definitely a bug in the runtime LSP implementation of inlay hints inside nvim and not a bug of any LSP server or AstroNvim. I already did the necessary debugging steps and wrote a working fix for nvim v0.11.4. Please check my following notes and pull request to grasp all the details and check my implementation for the fix. I hope that this procedure is ok and doesn't waste any time.

### Steps to reproduce using "nvim -u minimal_init.lua"

I didn't create a `minimal_init.lua` script, but created the following simple [AstroNvim config](https://github.com/tobias-haenel/astronvim-inlay_hint-repro) that uses the [community repository](https://github.com/AstroNvim/astrocommunity) packs for [Vue.js](https://github.com/AstroNvim/astrocommunity/tree/main/lua/astrocommunity/pack/vue) and [TypeScript](https://github.com/AstroNvim/astrocommunity/tree/main/lua/astrocommunity/pack/typescript-all-in-one) to setup the vtsls and volar (doing so [manually](https://github.com/vuejs/language-tools/wiki/Neovim) is actually quite complex which might lead to other bugs from my side). I also created a [Vue.js test repository](https://github.com/tobias-haenel/vue-nvim-inlay_hint-col-bug-repro.git) to reproduce this error, because that is a language where two LSP clients ([vtsls](https://github.com/yioneko/vtsls) and [volar](https://github.com/vuejs/language-tools)) provide inlay hints at the same time

1. `git clone https://github.com/tobias-haenel/astronvim-inlay_hint-repro.git ~/.config/nvim-repro`
2. `git clone https://github.com/tobias-haenel/vue-nvim-inlay_hint-col-bug-repro.git inlay-hint-repro`
3. `cd inlay-hint-repro`
4. `pnpm install`
_(optional) for meaningful inlay hints - not necessary to reproduce the error_
5. `NVIM_APPNAME=nvim-repro nvim`
_with version 0.11.4_
6. _wait for Mason and TreeSitter install to finish (~2 minutes on my machine)_
7. `:q`
_quit nvim_
8. `NVIM_APPNAME=nvim-repro nvim src/components/Test.vue`
_open the test vue file_
9. _wait for `vtsls`, `volar` and first inlay hints to show up_
10. `:4`
_goto line 4_
11. `dd`
_delete the line_
12. _check the error at the bottom_

### Expected behavior

inlay hints continue to work after changes to the document and there is no col out of range error

### Nvim version (nvim -v)

NVIM v0.11.4 Build type: RelWithDebInfo LuaJIT 2.1.1760617492

### Language server name/version

vtsls 0.2.9 & volar 3.1.2

### Operating system/version

Arch Linux x86_64

### Log file

https://gist.github.com/tobias-haenel/81b3e4d7795218f692fd30b19e00da68
title: LSP: inlay_hint col out of range error with multiple LSP clients
